name: Used Electric Vehicle Rebate
description: $2,000 toward purchase of used plug-in hybrid or fully-electric vehicle from dealer; can combine with other rebates and tax credits
fullDescription: Peninsula Clean Energy helps income-qualified San Mateo County residents afford electric vehicles with a $2,000 rebate toward used plug-in hybrids or fully-electric vehicles.
whatTheyOffer:
- $2,000 rebate for used EV purchase
- Covers plug-in hybrid and fully-electric vehicles
- Must purchase from licensed dealer
- Can combine with federal tax credits
- Can combine with other state/local rebates
- Stackable with Clean Cars for All program
howToGetIt:
1. Verify you're a Peninsula Clean Energy customer
2. Confirm income eligibility (CARE/FERA enrollment)
3. Purchase qualifying used EV from licensed dealer
4. Apply within 180 days of purchase
5. Submit proof of purchase and vehicle registration
6. Receive rebate check after approval
